channel.title: Running a server
channel.description:
Hello moparscape peeps im having trouble making my privet server public..... this is whats going on
i have done eveyrhting tuts tell me to
* i got jdk * portforwarded * no-ip is working fine..
i can log into my server with my no-ip but no 1 eles can i dont get it and its making me kind of angry so if you can help it would be deeply apriceated:) (didnt spell that right) anyway thanks for readin :mad:

item.title: Running a server
item.dc:creator: @superninja superninja
item.description:
@superninja wrote:

how do i do that… and what does local host mean? lol [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 08:07:17 pm[/size][hr]ok so i went to whatismyip.com and do i go to change my ip and do my server name? like whatever .no-ip.org?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 08:09:29 pm[/size][hr]dont awser that

item.title: Running a server
item.dc:creator: @Jonesy1128 Jonesy1128
item.description:
@Jonesy1128 wrote:

You have set the ip to www.whatismyip.com (Your IP) and not localhost, right?
